alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued February 08 at 2:28AM PST until February 11 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Unseasonably hot conditions with daytime temperatures up to 89 possible. * WHERE...Orange County Coastal Areas, San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The unseasonable heat will increase the potential for heat related illnesses for visitors from other parts of the country where it is very cold.
info.instruction: Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
